PHQ9.original: Little interest or pleasure in doing things?

variants.text: Since exams started, have you stopped enjoying things you used to love?
Have you been skipping hangouts because nothing feels fun anymore?
With everything going on, have you been feeling really down or hopeless?
With your family pressuring you, have you felt crushed or without hope?

PHQ9.original: Trouble falling or staying asleep, or sleeping too much?

variants.text: With exam stress, are you having trouble sleeping or sleeping too much?
Are you staying up all night worrying or sleeping the whole day?

PHQ9.original: Feeling tired or having little energy?

variants.text: Even after rest, do you feel exhausted from all the pressure?
Do you feel drained even when you haven't done much?
Are you stress-eating or completely losing your appetite?
Has your eating pattern changed because of how you're feeling?

PHQ9.original: Feeling bad about yourself or that you are a failure or have let yourself or your family down?

variants.text: Do you feel like you're disappointing everyone, especially your family?
Are you constantly thinking you're not good enough or a failure?

PHQ9.original: Trouble concentrating on things, such as reading the newspaper or watching television?

variants.text: Is it hard to focus on studying or even simple things like watching TV?
Do you find your mind wandering when trying to concentrate?

PHQ9.original: Moving or speaking so slowly that other people could have noticed? Or the opposite - being so fidgety or restless that you have been moving around a lot more than usual?

variants.text: Are you either moving really slowly or feeling super restless and fidgety?
Have others noticed you acting unusually slow or hyperactive?

PHQ9.original: Thoughts that you would be better off dead, or of hurting yourself?

variants.text: Have you had thoughts about not wanting to be here anymore?
Are you having thoughts about ending things or hurting yourself?
